message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.SY 

This paper deals with resource allocation and platform operation settings, which are typically studied in the fields of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The problem of balancing immediate payoffs with learning client types and satisfying capacity constraints is a classic trade-off in game theory (cs.GT). The paper also involves sequential decision making, which is a common theme in data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and control systems (cs.SY).
